/debloat.name: Chris Titus Tech Windows Utility (WinUtil)
/debloat.blurb: Swiss-army knife for Windows — debloat, tweak, and kit out your OS in one shot.

/debloat.name: Sophia Script for Windows
/debloat.blurb: The power user’s debloater — fully scriptable, precision control over every tweak.

/debloat.name: O&O AppBuster
/debloat.blurb: Click-and-zap Windows apps you never wanted in the first place.

/debloat.name: O&O ShutUp10++
/debloat.blurb: One-click privacy lockdown for Windows telemetry and tracking.

/debloat.name: Privatezilla
/debloat.blurb: Minimalist privacy control panel that nukes Windows’ bad habits.

/debloat.name: Windows10Debloater (Sycnex)
/debloat.blurb: The OG script that started the modern Windows debloat craze.

/debloat.name: Winaero Tweaker
/debloat.blurb: Infinite knobs and dials to bend Windows’ UI and behavior to your will.

/debloat.name: WPD (Windows Privacy Dashboard)
/debloat.blurb: Compact dashboard for cutting off Microsoft’s data-snooping tentacles.

/debloat.name: Dism++
/debloat.blurb: A GUI front-end for DISM that feels like Windows’ hidden control room.

/debloat.name: Bulk Crap Uninstaller
/debloat.blurb: Wipes out stubborn apps in bulk — no mercy, no leftovers.

/debloat.name: Revo Uninstaller
/debloat.blurb: Clean uninstalls that dig deeper than Windows ever dreamed.

/debloat.name: Geek Uninstaller
/debloat.blurb: Portable, fast, gets rid of apps in one swipe — geek approved.

/debloat.name: NTLite
/debloat.blurb: Prebuild your dream Windows ISO without the fluff.

/drivers.name: Intel Driver & Support Assistant
/drivers.blurb: Intel’s official babysitter — keep chipsets, iGPUs, and Wi-Fi fresh.

/drivers.name: NVIDIA GeForce Experience
/drivers.blurb: One-stop hub for driver updates, ShadowPlay, and settings wizardry.

/drivers.name: AMD Adrenalin Software
/drivers.blurb: Red-team’s command center for drivers, tweaks, and game boosts.

/drivers.name: AMD Cleanup Utility
/drivers.blurb: Rip out every AMD driver trace before a fresh reinstall.

/drivers.name: Display Driver Uninstaller (DDU)
/drivers.blurb: The nuclear option for GPU drivers — wipe to bare metal.

/drivers.name: DriverStore Explorer
/drivers.blurb: Spring-clean hidden driver clutter in Windows’ vault.

/drivers.name: Snappy Driver Installer Origin (SDIO)
/drivers.blurb: Offline mega-pack for installing every driver under the sun.

/drivers.name: Microsoft Update Catalog
/drivers.blurb: The dusty warehouse of official Microsoft drivers and patches.

/drivers.name: NVCleanstall
/drivers.blurb: Install NVIDIA drivers minus the telemetry and junk.

/drivers.name: Zadig
/drivers.blurb: Essential tool for wrangling USB device drivers.

/drivers.name: Dell Command | Update
/drivers.blurb: Dell’s official updater — keep BIOS, drivers, and firmware synced.

/drivers.name: Lenovo System Update
/drivers.blurb: Factory-fresh drivers straight from Lenovo HQ.

/drivers.name: HP Support Assistant
/drivers.blurb: HP’s in-house tool for BIOS, drivers, and utilities.

/cpuoc.name: Intel Extreme Tuning Utility (XTU)

/cpuoc.name: AMD Ryzen Master
/cpuoc.blurb: Ryzen’s command deck for overclocking, PBO, and memory tuning.

/cpuoc.name: ThrottleStop
/cpuoc.blurb: Undervolt wizard and turbo tamer, especially on laptops.

/cpuoc.name: OCCT
/cpuoc.blurb: Comprehensive stability test suite — stress until it screams.

/cpuoc.name: AIDA64
/cpuoc.blurb: System analyzer that doubles as a brutal stability test.

/cpuoc.name: Prime95
/cpuoc.blurb: Legendary torture test — discover new max temps in seconds.

/cpuoc.name: Cinebench
/cpuoc.blurb: The standard candle for brag-worthy CPU scores.

/cpuoc.name: Linpack Xtreme
/cpuoc.blurb: Math-heavy stress test that punishes CPUs mercilessly.

/cpuoc.name: HWiNFO64
/cpuoc.blurb: Sensor junkie’s dream — every voltage, every temp, all live.

/cpuoc.name: CPU-Z
/cpuoc.blurb: Quick ID card for your silicon — and validation bragging rights.

/cpuoc.name: Core Temp
/cpuoc.blurb: Lightweight monitor for keeping tabs on your fiery cores.

/cpuoc.name: Geekbench
/cpuoc.blurb: Cross-platform benchmark for quick score flexing.

/gpuoc.name: MSI Afterburner

/gpuoc.name: AMD Adrenalin Software

/gpuoc.name: NVIDIA GeForce Experience
/gpuoc.blurb: Driver updates + easy overclock scanning baked in.

/gpuoc.name: ASUS GPU Tweak III

/gpuoc.name: EVGA Precision X1

/gpuoc.name: GPU-Z
/gpuoc.blurb: Lightweight GPU detective — every spec and sensor at a glance.

/gpuoc.name: 3DMark
/gpuoc.blurb: Gold-standard GPU benchmark with dozens of scenes to flex on.

/gpuoc.name: Unigine Superposition
/gpuoc.blurb: Cinematic GPU stress test with eye-candy galore.

/gpuoc.name: FurMark 2
/gpuoc.blurb: The donut of death — melts GPUs if they’re weak.

/gpuoc.name: CapFrameX
/gpuoc.blurb: Frame time analysis like a pro reviewer’s toolkit.

/gpuoc.name: NVIDIA Profile Inspector

/gpuoc.name: Intel Arc Control
/gpuoc.blurb: Intel’s official suite for Arc GPUs — drivers, tuning, and monitoring.

/fancontrol.name: Corsair iCUE
/fancontrol.blurb: Manage Corsair fans, pumps, and RGB from one dashboard.

/rgb.name: ASUS Armoury Crate
